content.rendered:
Congratulations to the following staff who were recognized at the June 6, 2024 tenure reception:

Administrative: Abigail Adams-Snell

Caroline Street: Benjamin Quinones and Sandra Mahoney

Division Street: Stephanie Landman

Dorothy Nolan: Bridget Kolakowski

Geyser Road Patricia Bateman, Kristen Burke, Julia Marino, and Anastasia Sperry

Greenfield: Rita Rhodes and Samantha Jacksland

Lake Avenue: Erin Griep and Emily Pyryemybida

Maple Avenue: Ashley Alexander, Jessi Boucher, and Rachael Emmitt

High School G. Nate Chandler, Darcy Pietropaolo, Mackenzie Robens, Devin Scott, Jessica Silva, Jennifer Vacchio, Dawn Alexanian, and Gretchen DiMaggio
